snippet: He was the voice of Prince Hans in “Frozen”; she played Cinderella. Now they’re on the way to happily ever after.
abstract: Vows column on wedding of Jessica Hershberg and Santino Fontana.
lead_paragraph: He was the voice of Prince Hans in “Frozen”; she played Cinderella. Now they’re on the way to happily ever after.

headline.print_headline: Is It Still a Fairy Tale if It’s Real?
headline.main: Jessica Hershberg and Santino Fontana: A Real-Life Fairy Tale
